Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Pivotal Cloud Platform Roadshow in Tampa. Please find the event details below:
Date: Thursday, January 29, 2015 Time: Registration begins @ 8:00AM/Keynote begins @9:00AM/Session #1 begins @ 10:10AM/Session #2 begins @ 11:30AM/Session #3 begins @ 2:15PM Location: Renaissance Tampa International Plaza Hotel, 4200 Jim Walter Blvd., Tampa, FL 33607
{{my.Save the Date - Tampa:default=edit me}}
Prior to the event, please create an account on Pivotal Network <https://network.pivotal.io/>. To fully participate in the workshop, bring your laptop with wireless connectivity enabled.
Questions? Please contact us via email <mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://www.pivotal.io>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
